column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////First time at this restaurant for a work meeting. We arrived right during happy hour
column2: there's about 10 of us. Food and drinks were good
column3: had the meatloaf and pork belly starters. Unfortunately this was not a good place for a work meeting
column4: the music was incredibly loud and the service wasn't that attentive... but would love to go back to check out their whiskey room.
